languages.text: {n}Торгашеские нотки в вашем голосе заставляют Немезита самодовольно улыбнуться. Палец на спусковом крючке чуть расслабляется.{/n} "С возмездием не торгуются, убожество".
{n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. His trigger finger relaxes slightly.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic creature."
languages.original_text: {n}Торгашеские нотки в вашем голосе заставляют Немезита самодовольно улыбнуться. Палец на спусковом крючке чуть расслабляется.{/n} "С возмездием не торгуются, убожество".

traits.locale_text: {n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. The finger on the trigger relaxes a little.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic wretch."
{n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. The finger on the trigger relaxes a little.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic wretch."
{n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. His trigger finger relaxes slightly.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic wretch."

{n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. His trigger finger relaxes slightly.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic creature."
{n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. His trigger finger relaxes slightly.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic creature."

languages.text: {n}Der feilschende Ton deiner Stimme lässt Nemesit selbstzufrieden lächeln. Sein Finger am Abzug entspannt sich ein wenig.{/n} "Ihr könnt mit Rache nicht verhandeln, erbärmliche Kreatur."
languages.original_text: {n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. His trigger finger relaxes slightly.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic creature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der feilschende Ton deiner Stimme lässt Nemesit selbstzufrieden lächeln. Sein Finger am Abzug entspannt sich ein wenig.{/n} "Ihr könnt mit Rache nicht verhandeln, erbärmliche Kreatur."

languages.text: {n}El tono negociador de tu voz da pie a una sonrisa satisfecha en el rostro de Nemesitio. El dedo del gatillo se relaja ligeramente.{/n} «No puedes llegar a un acuerdo con la venganza, criatura patética».
languages.original_text: {n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. His trigger finger relaxes slightly.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic creature."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tono negociador de tu voz da pie a una sonrisa satisfecha en el rostro de Nemesitio. El dedo del gatillo se relaja ligeramente.{/n} «No puedes llegar a un acuerdo con la venganza, criatura patética».

languages.text: {n}交渉するような口調に、ネメサイトは満足げな笑みを浮かべる。引き金の指がわずかに緩んだ。{/n}「復讐心に駆け引きは効かない、哀れだな」
languages.original_text: {n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. His trigger finger relaxes slightly.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic creature."

traits.locale_text: {n}交渉するような口調に、ネメサイトは満足げな笑みを浮かべる。引き金の指がわずかに緩んだ。{/n}「復讐心に駆け引きは効かない、哀れだな」

languages.text: {n}你惶恐的语气让涅墨斯特脸上露出了得意洋洋的微笑，他搭在扳机上的手指微微放松了下来。{/n}“你这只可怜虫，别以为你能和复仇的化身讨价还价。”
languages.original_text: {n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. His trigger finger relaxes slightly.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic creature."

traits.locale_text: {n}你惶恐的语气让涅墨斯特脸上露出了得意洋洋的微笑，他搭在扳机上的手指微微放松了下来。{/n}“你这只可怜虫，别以为你能和复仇的化身讨价还价。”

languages.text: {n}Le ton conciliant de votre voix fait naître un sourire satisfait sur le visage de Némésite. Son doigt se détend légèrement sur la gâchette.{/n} « N'espérez pas négocier avec la vengeance, pathétique créature. »
languages.original_text: {n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. His trigger finger relaxes slightly.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic creature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le ton conciliant de votre voix fait naître un sourire satisfait sur le visage de Némésite. Son doigt se détend légèrement sur la gâchette.{/n} « N'espérez pas négocier avec la vengeance, pathétique créature. »

languages.text: {n}Sesindeki pazarlıkçı ton, Nemezit'in yüzüne kanaatkâr bir gülümseme yerleşmesini sağlıyor. Tetikteki parmağı hafifçe rahatlıyor.{/n} "İntikamla pazarlık edemezsin sefil yaratık."
languages.original_text: {n}The haggling tone in your voice brings a complacent smile to Nemesite's face. His trigger finger relaxes slightly.{/n} "You cannot bargain with vengeance, pathetic creature."
